title: Amazon Essentials Slim-Fit Long Sleeve Shirt for Men, Pocket and No Pocket Styles
description: SLIM FIT DESIGN: Our men's long-sleeve t-shirt features a slim fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: Enjoy the soft, comfortable knit of our long-sleeve shirt for men
CLASSIC T-SHIRT: This men's long-sleeve shirt features a classic t-shirt construction with a pull-on crew neckline
COMFORT: Our slim-fit mens long sleeve shirt is designed with a ribbed neck trim and a tagless printed label
DURABLE STITCHING: Built to last, this black long sleeve shirt is crafted with double-needle stitching and soft jersey-knit taping on the neck seam
DETAILS: Solids are 100% cotton and heathers are a cotton-poly blend. Length is 29" from side neck on US size M

Crafted in a lightweight knit, this long sleeve t-shirt highlights both style and comfort. Made from soft, breathable fabric, our men's long-sleeve shirt offers a slim fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist. This classic t-shirt is designed with a ribbed neck trim and durable double-needle stitching.
